column364: Austria. Both victims were killed and the house was set on fire during the attack. An unaffiliated individual claimed responsibility for the incident and stated that he was motivated by hatred of the Freedom Party of Austria. Authorities stated that the assailant had recently pledged allegiance to the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) on social media."
column410: An unidentified unaffiliated individual claimed responsibility for the incident and stated that he targeted the Austrian couple for political reasons and that he opposed the Freedom Party of Austria.
